member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetAlphaDisable
member.summary: Specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the alpha channel.
member.param: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the alpha channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the Alpha channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the AlphaLinearTransfer function to the Alpha channel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetAlphaSlope
member.summary: Sets the slope of the linear function for the alpha channel.
member.param: The slope of the linear function for the alpha channel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetAlphaSlope
member.summary: Sets the slope of the linear function for the alpha channel.
member.param: An animation that represents how the slope of the linear function for the alpha channel changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetAlphaYIntercept
member.summary: Sets the Y-intercept of the linear function for the alpha channel.
member.param: The Y-intercept of the linear function for the alpha channel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetAlphaYIntercept
member.summary: Sets the Y-intercept of the linear function for the Alpha channel.
member.param: An animation that represents how the the Y-intercept of the linear function for the alpha channel. changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetBlueDisable
member.summary: Specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the blue channel.
member.param: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the blue channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the blue channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the BlueLinearTransfer function to the blue channel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.summary: Sets the slope of the linear function for the blue channel.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetBlueYIntercept
member.summary: Sets the Y-intercept of the linear function for the blue channel.
member.param: The Y-intercept of the linear function for the blue channel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetBlueYIntercept
member.summary: Sets the Y-intercept of the linear function for the blue channel.
member.param: An animation that represents how the Y-intercept of the linear function for the blue channel changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetClampOutput
member.summary: Specifies whether the effect clamps color values to between 0 and 1 before the effect passes the values to the next effect in the graph.
member.param: A boolean value that specifies whether the effect clamps color values to between 0 and 1 before the effect passes the values to the next effect in the graph. If you set this to TRUE the effect will clamp the values. If you set this to FALSE, the effect will not clamp the color values, but other effects and the output surface may clamp the values if they are not of high enough precision.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect.SetGreenDisable
member.summary: Specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the green channel.
member.param: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply the transfer function to the green channel. If you set this to TRUE the effect does not apply the transfer function to the green channel. If you set this to FALSE it applies the GreenLinearTransfer function to the green channel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionLinearTransferEffect
member.summary: The linear transfer effect is used to map the color intensities of an image using a linear function created from a list of values you provide for each channel.
